column4: i logged out a couple times, restarted... are there any other solutions to the signature key problem?
it's a Krappy Desktop Environment.  Big bloated windows lookalike thing.  Alternative to GNOME.
you can install the package.  no need to build it
what do you need to install?
could it be "libglib2.0-dev" that you need?
aw comon, what is wrong with it?
isn't it better to learn the command line than to rely on mc?
well mc has a bit of command line
